attributes.action: request Parliament to ask The Speaker to stop referring to MPs as "The Honourable Member for" and start calling them "The Current Member for".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The age old tradition of assuming all MPs to be "Honourable" is clearly outdated and incorrect. Calling them "The Current Member for" would remind them that their position is dependant on their electorate.

rejection.details: Parliament is a separate entity to Government. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
